thread.title: Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom call off their divorce

title: Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom call off their divorce
text:

By Liz Raftery, 
We're guessing Kim 's not going to be too happy about this. 
After Lamar Odom 's near-death experience last week, he and estranged wife Khloe Kardashian are going to give their marriage another shot, TMZ reports. 
Kardashian's lawyer asked a judge on Wednesday to throw out their divorce papers, according to the report. 
Kardashian filed for divorce in December 2013, but their split was never finalized. Because the couple were still legally married, Kardashian was responsible for decisions regarding Odom's medical care during his recent hospital stint. 
On Oct. 13, Odom was rushed to a hospital after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, where he had reportedly spent $75,000 over the course of three days. Odom had allegedly consumed drugs including crack cocaine, and herbal sexual enhancements. After three days in a coma, Odom regained consciousness and was moved to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles earlier this week. The incident is under investigation . 
Kardashian, who had been dating NBA player James Harden, said earlier this week that she was putting their relationship on hold so that she could be by Odom's side during his recovery.
